segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights the garden outside, all neat and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's drying dishes so diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron looks homey, like a perfect housewife scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then there's the sinkâ€”water's gushing out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a huge puddle, yet she keeps working away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are having their little adventure with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is so determined, reaching in boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's waiting patiently; it's kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even if the stool's a bit unsteady, they're being sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the curtains are tied back, letting in the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of joyful family moments, hazards and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate she's holding shines; everything's almost perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies must taste amazing; wish I could join.
segments.speaker: PAR
